== Bio ==
Thomas coordinates the new NeIC strategic area on environmental sciences
which supports Nordic collaboration within initiatives such as
EISCAT_3D, Nordic LifeWatch, GBIF, NordicESM, eSTICC, WRAM. He has a
background in computer science and geography and is working with
distributed e-Infrastructures for more than 15 years.  Thomas is located
at the University Center for Information Technology at the University of
Oslo, Norway.
